title: NASA’s LEXI Will Provide X-Ray Vision of Earth’s Magnetosphere
summary: A NASA X-ray imager is heading to the Moon as part of NASA’s Artemis campaign, where it will capture the first global images of the magnetic field that shields Earth from solar radiation.
